lead_paragraph: David Friedman, who wrote an op-ed in which he compared liberal American Jews to Jews who aided the Nazis, told a Senate panel he would be “respectful and measured” if confirmed.
snippet: David Friedman, who wrote an op-ed in which he compared liberal American Jews to Jews who aided the Nazis, told a Senate panel he would be “respectful and measured” if confirmed....

headline.main: Trump’s Nominee for Israel Envoy Apologizes for ‘Hurtful Words’
headline.print_headline: Nominee for Israel Envoy Regrets ‘Hurtful Words’
